intro.p: Without computing the line integral, use the vector field and the direction of the line integral (from P to Q) to estimate if the value of this integral is positive or negative.

outtro.p: The value of this line integral is {{intvalue}}.

content.p: Directly compute the line integral \int_C \left\langle {{fx}}, {{fy}} \right\rangle \cdot d\mathbf{r}, where C is the {{ctype}} originating at P{{p}} and ending at Q{{q}}.
